name: Agatha Christie: Dead Man's Folly
summary:
Hercule Poirot is invited to take part in a thrilling mock-murder game. While visitors follow clues to figure out whodunit, those in charge find themselves with a rising sense of uncertainty. Could an insider be using this charade as the perfect disguise for some despicable scheme?! The full version of Agatha Christie: Dead Man's Folly features: 
* 15 gorgeous locations to search 
* 48 challenging levels 
* Complex puzzles to solve 
Search scenes to uncover clues, solve puzzles, and reveal the truth behind a dark secret when you download the free trial of Agatha Christie: Dead Man's Folly today!
